RACE.RACE_TEXT: HAWTHORNE RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 80. Claiming Purse 21000. FOR FILLIES THREE YEARS OLD OR FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners of a race since July 6 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $20,000 (Claiming races for $17,500 or less not considered in eligibility and allowances).

CLAIM.OWNER: Reavis, Michael L. and Fraterrigo, Gregory J.

RACE.FOOTNOTES: MYSTIC STORM set the early pace on the inside, then was headed and passed on the turn, made a rebid leaving the turn to draw clear leaving the quarter pole, then remained clear to prove best, driving. JUDY'S MS. OFFICER was rated along the inside, then was blocked and steadied by the three sixteenths, then had room leaving the quarter pole and finished well to be clearly second best. STORMY EMPIRE chased the pace three wide and made a four wide bid leaving the three sixteenths but flattened out, got show award. LUCY'S LOOKIN LEFT was bumped at the start, settled early, three wide by the quarter pole and had no rally. KITTY MACLEAN prompted the pace and made a three wide bid on the turn to gain the lead but came up empty off the turn. RUNNERS HEAT was settled early three to four wide and was not a factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Mystic Storm
ENTRY.OWNER: Wolfe Racing LLC and Robertson, Hugh H.
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace inside, headed turn, re-bid 1/4, drew clear, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Judy's Ms. Officer
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated inside, blocked, steadied 3/16, finished well, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Lucy's Lookin Left
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, settled, 3 wide 1/4 pole, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Stormy Empire
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace 3 wide, bid 4 wide, flattened out,

ENTRY.NAME: Kitty Maclean
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted pace 3 wide, bid 3 wide, empty stretch,

ENTRY.NAME: Runners Heat
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled 3-4 wide, no factor,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HAWTHORNE RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 74. Claiming Purse 18500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners of a race since July 6 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (Claiming races for $12,500 or less not considered in estimating allowances) .
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BOURBON SPIRIT was well rated early, made a four wide move off the turn to take over leaving the quarter pole, then drew clear and remained clear under mild urging to prove best. CHAD'S FLASH was allowed to settle early, angled out in the lane and rallied well to be clearly second best. GALLANT BUCK stalked the early pace and made a two wide bid off the turn to vie for command between rivals but weakened, bested rest. TABLE MONEY was allowed to settle early, advanced two wide on the turn and swung out three wide leaving the turn but was empty in the drive. MAD DRAGON set the pace on the inside and weakened in the lane.

ENTRY.NAME: Chad's Flash
ENTRY.OWNER: Golobic Martin Rodriguez Eduardo and Rodriguez Ricardo
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, angled out, rallied, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Bourbon Spirit
ENTRY.OWNER: Flurry Racing Stables LLC and Titletown Racing Stables
ENTRY.COMMENT: well rated, 4 wide move, drew clear, mild drive

ENTRY.NAME: Mad Dragon
ENTRY.OWNER: Brown, Kathleen J. and Bigelow, Gail
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace inside, weakened stretch,

ENTRY.NAME: Table Money
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, advanced 2 wide turn, swung 3 wide, empty,

ENTRY.NAME: Gallant Buck
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 2 wide, bid 2 wide, weakened, bested rest

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HAWTHORNE RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 83. Claiming Purse 15500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON THREE RACES IN 2023 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners of a race since July 6 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Claiming races for $4,000 or less not considered in allowances).

CLAIM.OWNER: Down the Stretch Racing Stables Inc (Larry Rivelli) and Schaefer Homer

RACE.FOOTNOTES: KENNESAW was rated along the inside on the turn, angled out for racing room and made a bid, then dueled for the final sixteenth and prevailed late to prove best, driving. D'ARCHER pressed the pace and made a two wide bid off the turn, then dueled with the winner to the wire and missed. WILDWOOD SECRET broke sharply from the inside and then set a pressured pace on the turn, dug in gamely in the drive but faded late. NYOMAN was rated three wide, came four wide into the lane and had no kick. Z U SOON was void of early speed, three wide by the quarter pole and found best stride late. Race was HAND TIMED

ENTRY.NAME: Wildwood Secret
ENTRY.COMMENT: sharp break, set pressured pace inside, dug in stretch, late fade

ENTRY.NAME: Kennesaw
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated inside, angled out, closed, dueled 1/16, prevailed,

ENTRY.NAME: D'archer
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace 2 wide, bid 2 wide, out-kicked

ENTRY.NAME: Nyoman
ENTRY.COMMENT: ratd 3 wide, came 4 wide, no kick

ENTRY.NAME: Z U Soon
ENTRY.COMMENT: void early speed, 3 wide 1/4 pole, best stride late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HAWTHORNE RACE 4 5 1/2F Turf CR: 73. Claiming Purse 18000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners of a race since July 6 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000 (Claiming races for $12,500 or less not considered in est imating allowances). (Rail at 10 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FROSTED ECLAIR bumped at the start, reserved early, three wide move on the turn, then dueled for the lead by the furlong marker, bumped with MOVE IT BABY late and prevailed late to prove best, driving. MOVE IT BABY set the pace on the inside and drew clear on the turn, then was headed by the winner by the furlong marker, then bumped with that rival late and missed. MAGNA MASSA was settled early two wide, swung out four wide leaving the turn and rally mildly. SUNSET PAYNTER hit the gate coming out at the start, reserved early, improved late for the final spot in the superfecta. HEAVENLY SCENT pressed the pace two wide and weakened. SLEEPY CAT was close up early between rivals and stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Move It Baby
ENTRY.OWNER: Patricia's Hope LLC and Ravin Richard
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace inside, drew clear turn, headed 1/8, bumped late,missed

ENTRY.NAME: Sunset Paynter
ENTRY.COMMENT: hit gate start, reserved early, improved

ENTRY.NAME: Frosted Eclair
ENTRY.OWNER: Gavilsky II Lawrence J Pohl Dennis Throm Keith H and Throm Collin
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, reserved, 3 wide move, bumped late, prevailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Sleepy Cat
ENTRY.OWNER: Robertson Hugh H Mentz John and Fisher Ray D
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up early between horses, stopped

ENTRY.NAME: Magna Massa
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled, 2 wide turn, swung out 4 wide, mild rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Heavenly Scent
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace 2 wide, weakened,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HAWTHORNE RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 60. Maiden Special Weight Purse 38000. FOR ILLINOIS REGISTERED, CONCEIVED AND/OR FOALED. Maidens, Three Years Old and Upward. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SAWYER FOX was away alertly to set the pace on the inside while clear, drew out on the turn, then drew off in the lane under hand urging and was wrapped up late to prove much the best. EL MUCHO tracked the winner two wide, then chased that rival on the turn and proved to be no match for that rival while saving the place award. J J'S SOLUTION was reserved early on the inside, swung out three wide leaving the turn and finished willingly to just miss the place award, bested rest. GOD GUNS N GUTS stumbled at the start and was far back early, improved position late. FLYING CRICKET chased the early pace in between rivals and then saved ground on the turn and weakened. LONE RETURN was reserved early, failed to menace. ROCKET MAN ATTACK chased the pace three to four wide and stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: J J's Solution
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved inside, swung 3 wide, finished willingly, missed place

ENTRY.NAME: El Mucho
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace 2 wide, chased turn, held 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Lone Return
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved early, failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: God Guns N Guts
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled start, far back early, improved

ENTRY.NAME: Flying Cricket
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased between early, inside turn, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Sawyer Fox
ENTRY.OWNER: Catalano Thoroughbreds Inc and LAZ Racing Stable LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set unchallenged pace, drew off, wrapped up

ENTRY.NAME: Rocket Man Attack
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace 3 wide, came 4 wide, stopped

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HAWTHORNE RACE 6 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 96. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 41000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR STATE BRED OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $40,000. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners of a race at a mile or o ver since July 6 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $40,000 (Claiming races for $25,000 or less not considered in estimating allowances) (Preference by condition eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BOCA BOY dueled for the lead on the inside and had a long drive in the lane then edged clear late to prove best under a drive. GUN RUSH dueled for the lead on the outside, two wide on the turn but was out-kicked late by the winner, second best. MOMENT broke outwardly at the start bumping a rival, then rated early, made a three wide move on the turn but flattened out. SOUL COAXING was allowed to settle early, made a four wide move on the turn but flattened out. JEFF THE LION lacked a serious rally. COALMINER'S KITTEN was sandwiched at the start, then failed to menace. MILLARD'S SMILE was bumped hard at the start, then was not a factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Boca Boy
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside, long drive stretch, edged clear late, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Moment
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke outwardly, bumped rival, rated, 3 wide move, flattened out,

ENTRY.NAME: Millard's Smile
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped hard start, no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Coalminer's Kitten
ENTRY.COMMENT: sandwiched start, failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Jeff the Lion
ENTRY.OWNER: Cherrywood Racing II and Donohoe Laura
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved early, lacked rally

ENTRY.NAME: Soul Coaxing
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, 4 wide move turn, flattened out,

ENTRY.NAME: Gun Rush
ENTRY.OWNER: Basler Thomas J and Pohl Dennis
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled outside, 2 wide turn, long drive, out-kicked, 2nd best

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HAWTHORNE RACE 7 7 1/2F Turf CR: 92. Allowance Purse 39000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners of a race since July 6 Allowed 2 lbs. (Claim ing races for $20,000 or less not considered in estimating allowances) (Preference by condition eligibility). (Rail at 10 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: OUT OF DEDUCTIONS stumbled at the start, made a three wide move on the turn to be in contention off the turn, then wore down his barn mate late to edged clear to prove best, driving. SIMPLE LOGIC stalked the early pace, made a two wide bid off the turn to take over, then could not hold off the winner late, second best. MCMONEY was rated along the inside, angled out in the lane and rallied mildly late on th left lead to gain the show award. VITALE was away alertly to set the early pace on the inside, then was headed off the turn and faded and lost the show award late. MODIFIER was allowed to settle early, split rivals by the quarter pole, then came four wide into the lane and improved late. RUSSIAN HAMMER was settled early, moved to the inside on the turn and angled out in the lane but had no rally. COMING UP ACES lacked a rally. ANDREW THE GIANT chased the pace three wide and tired. STAR NATION failed to menace.

ENTRY.NAME: Modifier
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, split rivals 1/4, came 4 wide, improved

ENTRY.NAME: Star Nation
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Vitale
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace inside, faded, lost 3rd late

ENTRY.NAME: McMoney
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated inside, angled out stretch, late rally, left lead

ENTRY.NAME: Simple Logic
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, bid 2 wide, clear, caught, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Andrew the Giant
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace 3 wide, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Out of Deductions
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled start, 3 wide move turn, wore down rival, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Coming Up Aces
ENTRY.OWNER: Glander Jessamyn L and Miller Racing Stable Ltd
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved early, lacked rally

ENTRY.NAME: Russian Hammer
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, inside turn, angled out, no rally,
